buginformation.summary: operator precedence breaks with certain combinations and
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem try compile this using either simple advanced optimizations what the expected output what you see instead expected probably actual incorrectly bumped the beginning what version the product are you using what operating system happens latest version and online the looks things the change occurred somewhere between versions 20111003 and 20111114 please provide any additional information below and all have the same operator precedence they should left right but hoisting the the beginning means the wrong side the modulus operator good catch thanks for the report this issue was closed revision 96ce 395944e
